intro: Cristaria ecristata, commonly known as the spire-moss, is a rare and delicate species of moss found in specific, moist environments. It belongs to the family Hypnaceae and is characterized by its slender, spiral-shaped shoots. The plant forms dense, cushion-like colonies that thrive in shaded, nutrient-rich soil.
